projects.project_brief: Home Garden Florist, an online store all about delightful and beautiful floral products. Hoping to bless the clients with high quality hand-made floral products.
projects.proj_desc: A classy yet elegant key visual to express the beauty of the brand. The logo viusal is inspired by Janpanese 'Kamon', a iconography representing different ethnic groups - Home.
projects.info-two: Tailor-made Chinese typography with hand-written structure and thin stoke tips at the end to express the finess beauty of the brand. The thinner typorgraphy is set to be print with hight readibility even at a very small size regardless of print quality.
projects.info-three: Stroke weight variation and curve are deisgned to be fountain-pen like. To make the logo more humane with a taste of hand-made.
projects.info-four: Stationary including business card and product tag are included in the design package. Simplicity is the solely aim to make the brand image more sophisticated.

projects.project_brief: With the reform of the educational institute, its department of SES is desperately requesting for a new logo that can come up to meet the modern standard.
projects.proj_desc: A newly designed logo that aims at conveying the role of the discipline. Make use of witty design strategies while keeping the etiquette of an educational institution.
projects.info-two: A Timeless logo that strike a balance between message conveying, visual forms and functionality.
projects.info-three: Multiple meanings adopted in the logo, yet its never too busy or vague while tell the stories.
